name: CrazySharo
description: CrazySharo is a deflationary token build on the Binance Smart Chain with capped total supply of 10.000.000.000(10 billion). There will be no further emissions and no inflation. Our team has been working hard to create a project where everyone could participate, invest and win. CrazySharo is the only payment method used in our NFT challenge and our Web3 NFT marketplace.
